thread.title: Teresa Mcgee
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Teresa Mcgee

author: Teresa Mcgee
title: Teresa Mcgee
text:
I have been a customer for many years. They respond quickly to questions or claims.
I recommended CC to my daughter and son-in-law and they are saving money and are happy with the customer service.
